sn22.132:4.3: “Reverend Sāriputta, they speak of this thing called ‘knowledge’.
sn22.132:4.5: And how is an knowledgeable person defined?”
sn22.132:5.1: “Reverend, an educated noble disciple truly understands the origin, the ending, the gratification, the drawback, and the escape when it comes to form,
sn22.132:5.7: And this is how an knowledgeable person is defined.”
